official_title: A bill to provide for the conveyance of the Miles City National Fish Hatchery to the State of Montana.

summary.text: Directs the Secretary of the Interior to convey to the State of Montana all right, title, and interest to the Miles City National Fish Hatchery in Miles City, Montana.

titles.title: A bill to provide for the conveyance of the Miles City National Fish Hatchery to the State of Montana.
